item.title: Corrective controls with Conformance Packs
item.description: In this builder session, learn how to build a solution that will evaluate your AWS resources for configuration compliance using AWS Config Conformance Packs. You will also learn how to improve your security posture by remediating non-compliant resources using automatic remediation actions. Requirements: You will need AWS IAM Managed Policy “arn:aws:iam::aws:policy/AdministratorAccess” or equivalent. Contents Introduction Setup Prerequisite Resources Enable AWS Config Deploy Conformance Pack View Compliance and Remediation Clean-up Learn More
